original: phyogs mtshams la yang zad par mi 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams la yang zad par mi 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: The “cardinal and intermediate directions” should be included in the “extremes.”

original: rigs kyi bu ci nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dgag pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu ci nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dgag pa'o //
translated: “Son of noble family, in whatever way” and so on rejects the attention that is not reality.

original: bdag las ma yin 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag las ma yin 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Not from self, nor from a collection” means that the person is neither substantially real nor imputedly real.

original: 'jig pas ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pas ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: “From destruction” means “from destruction.”

original: lus yin pas na tshogs te mi rtag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la 'jig tshogs zhes brjod do //
analyzed: lus yin pas na tshogs te mi rtag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la 'jig tshogs zhes brjod do //
translated: “Collection” means “body,” and impermanent form and so on are called “a collection of what is subject to destruction.”

original: 'jig tshogs la gang zag tu 'dogs so //🔽des na bdag las ma yin /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la gang zag tu 'dogs so // des na bdag las ma yin /
translated: The person is imputed in dependence on that.

original: 'jig tshogs las kyang ma gyos zhes bya ba ni gang zag rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin btags par yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs las kyang ma gyos zhes bya ba ni gang zag rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin btags par yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, “not from self” and “nor from a collection” means that the person is neither substantially real nor imputedly real,

original: gnyi g-yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyi g-yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because neither is observed.

original: ci nas gzugs la sogs pa la ma yin te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ci nas gzugs la sogs pa la ma yin te zhes bya ba la /
translated: How is it that they are not in form, etc.?

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so zhes dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that the phenomena of the aggregates of form, etc. are not perceived.

original: de'i phyir g-yos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gis gyos pa'o //🔽'di dag la sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir g-yos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gis gyos pa'o // 'di dag la sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, “they are not agitated” means that they are not agitated by these.

original: ldog pa'o // lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'o // lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o //
translated: The superimposition of these is destroyed, i.e., eliminated. The rest is easily understood.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin du nges par gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin du nges par gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word “thus” has the meaning of “thusness,” i.e., thusness is ascertained.

original: snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i @221b lam ston pa'o //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i @221b lam ston pa'o //
translated: “Illumination” means the teaching of the path of liberation.

original: sgrub par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la yang dag par skyes par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la yang dag par skyes par 'dod pa'o //
translated: “Desire to accomplish” means the desire to generate it in oneself.

original: mos pa bskyed la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'di nges par gzung ba gang las she na /
analyzed: mos pa bskyed la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'di nges par gzung ba gang las she na /
translated: “Having generated devotion” means having ascertained thusness. From what?

original: chos thams cad la'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la'o //
translated: From all phenomena.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la ste /
translated: In emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽In the emptiness of what appears as objects,

original: ji ltar snang ba don med pa'i stong pa dag la'o //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba don med pa'i stong pa dag la'o //
translated: and in the emptiness of what is illusory.

original: de yang 'khrul pa snang ba'i mtshan ma rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'khrul pa snang ba'i mtshan ma rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because the signs of the appearance of error are naturally stopped.

original: mtshan ma med pa de dag la'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa de dag la'o //
translated: In the signlessness of those,

original: des na 'khrul pa tsam du mthong ba'i khams gsum pa dag la smon pa med pa'i phyir smon pa med pa dag la'o //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa tsam du mthong ba'i khams gsum pa dag la smon pa med pa'i phyir smon pa med pa dag la'o //
translated: and in the wishlessness of the three realms, which are seen as mere error.

original: kha cig tu stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'don te /
analyzed: kha cig tu stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'don te /
translated: In some places the word “emptiness” is used.

original: der ni rang gi don la dngos po'i rkyen bya'o //
analyzed: der ni rang gi don la dngos po'i rkyen bya'o //
translated: There, one’s own aim is the condition for the thing.

original: mtshan ma yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “having abandoned signs” is the teaching.

original: 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma can gyis dngos po la mngon par zhen pa de ni 'dir mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma can gyis dngos po la mngon par zhen pa de ni 'dir mtshan ma ste /
translated: The sign here is the attachment to things by those who have the signs of error.

original: de yongs su spangs pas so //
analyzed: de yongs su spangs pas so //
translated: Because of the abandonment of that.

original: dngos po yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can du lta ba yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can du lta ba yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o //
translated: The abandonment of entities and the abandonment of the view of sentient beings is explained.

original: dngos po ni chos su lta ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni chos su lta ba'o //
translated: Entities are the view of phenomena.

original: sems can du lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba ste /
analyzed: sems can du lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba ste /
translated: The view of sentient beings is the view of self.

original: de dag yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are abandoned.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: As for spiritual friend, etc., etc. refers to the teacher of the Dharma.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are as before.

original: dngos po med pa ni ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa'o //
translated: Non-entity is non-arising, non-birth, and non-cessation.

original: gang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: gang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
translated: What is non-arising, non-birth, and non-cessation is non-entity.

original: de bas na ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / dngos po med pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: de bas na ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / dngos po med pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: Therefore, non-arising, non-birth, non-cessation, and non-entity are phenomena.

original: de ltar chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
analyzed: de ltar chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
translated: Those who teach the Dharma in this way are spiritual friends.

original: de las bzlog pa'i chos ston pa ni sdig pa'i grogs por don gyis rtog par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i chos ston pa ni sdig pa'i grogs por don gyis rtog par bya'o //
translated: Those who teach the Dharma in a way that is contrary to this should be understood to be, in fact, bad friends.

original: bsgrubs na zhes bya ba ni gnas na'o //🔽byas pa gzo pa ni thos pa byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrubs na zhes bya ba ni gnas na'o // byas pa gzo pa ni thos pa byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “If you practice” means if you live with them.🔽“They are grateful” means they are grateful for what they have learned.

original: byas pa tshor ba ni thos pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa tshor ba ni thos pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “They are appreciative” means they know the result of what they have learned.

original: yongs su rtogs la zhes bya ba ni sems pas so //
analyzed: yongs su rtogs la zhes bya ba ni sems pas so //
translated: “They understand” means they understand through reflection.

original: 'jig rten gyi zang zing zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / @222a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi zang zing zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / @222a * //
translated: “Worldly material things” means food and drink,

original: gos la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gos la sogs pa'o //
translated: clothing, etc.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de mngon par 'dod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de mngon par 'dod par bya ba'o //
translated: “You should be generous” means you should desire to give them.

original: 'brang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'o //
translated: “You should follow them” means you should follow them.

original: yod de zhes bya ba ni 'di yod pa'o //
analyzed: yod de zhes bya ba ni 'di yod pa'o //
translated: “They exist” means they are present.

original: bsnyen pa la sogs tshig gsum gyis ni kun nas bsten pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsnyen pa la sogs tshig gsum gyis ni kun nas bsten pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The three phrases beginning with “you should serve them” mean “you should attend on them.”

original: zil gyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni nyes pa med par byas pas so //
analyzed: zil gyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni nyes pa med par byas pas so //
translated: Having overcome means having made them faultless.

original: sems can gdul bya zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gdul bya zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The disciplining of sentient beings means protecting the minds of sentient beings.

original: rab tu gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yongs su gzung ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yongs su gzung ba'i don to //
translated: The thorough protection means the meaning of thorough protection.

original: chags pa ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni sred pa'o //
translated: Attachment is craving.

original: sgrib pa ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: Obstruction is the objective support.

original: yang dag pa'i tshul ni don dam pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i tshul ni don dam pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The correct method is the distinction of the ultimate.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas na kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas na kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no affliction, there is no affliction.

original: rnam par byang ba med pas na /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pas na /
translated: Since there is no purification,

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin no //
translated: there is no purification.

original: chos thams cad ni sems can med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni gang zag la bdag med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni sems can med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni gang zag la bdag med pa gsungs so //
translated: The phrase all phenomena are without sentient beings and so on teaches the selflessness of persons.

original: sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni chos la bdag med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni chos la bdag med pa gsungs so //
translated: The phrase like an illusion and so on teaches the selflessness of phenomena.

original: phyir bsngo ba zhes bya ba ni lan gyi tshig go //
analyzed: phyir bsngo ba zhes bya ba ni lan gyi tshig go //
translated: The response is the reply.

original: yid mi skyo ba zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'o //
analyzed: yid mi skyo ba zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'o //
translated: “Not discouraged” means not weary.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: “Teaching” means demonstrating.

original: du  zhing ni mchi ma 'byin pas so //
analyzed: du  zhing ni mchi ma 'byin pas so //
translated: “Weeping” means shedding tears.

original: chos de ni dman pa'i sgras so //
analyzed: chos de ni dman pa'i sgras so //
translated: “That Dharma” means the inferior vehicle.

original: mya ngan ni 'dod pa'i yid do //
analyzed: mya ngan ni 'dod pa'i yid do //
translated: “Sorrow” means mental dissatisfaction.

original: smra ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba'o //
analyzed: smra ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba'o //
translated: “Speaking” means speaking in various ways.

original: rjes su 'brang ba ni ldan pas so //
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba ni ldan pas so //
translated: “Following” means being endowed with.

original: bskor ba ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: bskor ba ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: “Surrounding” means completely surrounding.

original: 'o bas ni 'o bas so //
analyzed: 'o bas ni 'o bas so //
translated: “Kissing” means kissing.

original: 'byor pa ni nor phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor pa ni nor phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: “Prosperity” means wealth.

original: rgyas pa ni shing dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni shing dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas so //
translated: “Flourishing” means trees, gardens, and so on.

original: bde ba ni 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba ni 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Happiness” means being free from harm.

original: lo legs pa ni bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed sla ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lo legs pa ni bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed sla ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Good harvest” means food and drink are easily obtained.

original: gang ba ni rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: gang ba ni rgya che ba'o //
translated: “Full” means vast.

original: mang po ni skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs so //
analyzed: mang po ni skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs so //
translated: “Many” means various kinds of people.

original: gang dag la 'khor de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang dag la 'khor de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who have such an assembly are called that.

original: gang na mi de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang na mi de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That place where such people exist is called that.

original: bar ni nang ngo //
analyzed: bar ni nang ngo //
translated: The middle is the inside.

original: srang ni nyo tshong gi gnas te /
analyzed: srang ni nyo tshong gi gnas te /
translated: The street is the place of buying and selling.

original: de ni srang lnga brgya dag gis nges par gtams pa ni ma lus par gtams pa ste /
analyzed: de ni srang lnga brgya dag gis nges par gtams pa ni ma lus par gtams pa ste /
translated: That is filled with five hundred streets, completely filled.

original: lam srang ra ba'i mthar thug par ri mor bris pa lta bur gtams pa'o //
analyzed: lam srang ra ba'i mthar thug par ri mor bris pa lta bur gtams pa'o //
translated: The streets are filled like a picture to the end of the wall.

original: ri mo yang yin la bris pa yang yin pas ri mor bris pa'o //
analyzed: ri mo yang yin la bris pa yang yin pas ri mor bris pa'o //
translated: It is a picture and also painted, so it is a picture.

original: bris pa ni @222b ngo mtshar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bris pa ni @222b ngo mtshar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is painted because it is amazing.

original: bzhin du zhes bya ba ni grong dang rjes su mthun par ro //
analyzed: bzhin du zhes bya ba ni grong dang rjes su mthun par ro //
translated: Like that means in accordance with the town.

original: des nyam mi nga ba na mnyam zhing gsal ba'o //
analyzed: des nyam mi nga ba na mnyam zhing gsal ba'o //
translated: When it is not frightening, it is even and clear.

original: skye bo dang / khri dang bzhon pa rnams 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas ni yang dag par 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas te /
analyzed: skye bo dang / khri dang bzhon pa rnams 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas ni yang dag par 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas te /
translated: The place where people, thrones, and vehicles gather and go is the place of gathering and going.

original: lam srang rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: lam srang rgya che ba'o //
translated: The streets are vast.

original: de dag gzhag pa ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gzhag pa ni gnas pa'o //
translated: Their arrangement is the dwelling.

original: legs par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par brgyan pa'o //
translated: Well-established means well-adorned.

original: de la skye bo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten no //
analyzed: de la skye bo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten no //
translated: The people and so on are the world.

original: khri ni khyogs so //
analyzed: khri ni khyogs so //
translated: The dais is a palanquin.

original: bzhon pa ni shing rta'o //
analyzed: bzhon pa ni shing rta'o //
translated: The vehicle is a chariot.

original: gong na med pa'i phyir dang / phan tshun mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa'i phyir dang / phan tshun mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'o //
translated: They are equal and similar because they are unsurpassed and mutually equal.

original: mda' yab rnams ni ka zhu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mda' yab rnams ni ka zhu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The railings are the kaṣāyas and so on.

original: mtho ba ni ra ba las shin tu rgya che ba cung zad mtho zhing phyir 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: mtho ba ni ra ba las shin tu rgya che ba cung zad mtho zhing phyir 'dor ba'o //
translated: They are high because they are slightly higher and protruding than the walls.

original: tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yangs shing mtho ba'o //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yangs shing mtho ba'o //
translated: They are of proper size because they are wide and high.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: They are various because they are different in various ways.

original: mda' yab las skyes pa'i shing thams cad kyang mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: mda' yab las skyes pa'i shing thams cad kyang mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du 'brel pa'o //
translated: All the trees that grow from the railings are connected to the trees of the second railing in the same way that they exist.

original: thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la thams cad yod pas na thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la thams cad yod pas na thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is called endowed with everything because everything is present here.

original: g-yer ka'i dra ba zhes bya ba ni ra ba'i ngos bzhi'i mda' yab dang 'brel pa'i shing nor bu'i skud pa bzhis sbrel ba la nor bu'i skud pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'phyang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yer ka'i dra ba zhes bya ba ni ra ba'i ngos bzhi'i mda' yab dang 'brel pa'i shing nor bu'i skud pa bzhis sbrel ba la nor bu'i skud pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'phyang ba'o //
translated: The so-called latticework is a wooden structure connected to the four sides of the wall, with four jeweled strings, and various jeweled strings hanging down.

original: 'jam pa ni rnar snyan pa'i phyir ro //🔽yid du 'ong ba ni sems bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jam pa ni rnar snyan pa'i phyir ro // yid du 'ong ba ni sems bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Smooth means pleasing to the ear.🔽Delightful means the mind is happy.

original: snyan pa ni yid 'phrog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snyan pa ni yid 'phrog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Beautiful means captivating the mind.

original: yan lag lnga pa ni pi wang dang gling bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag lnga pa ni pi wang dang gling bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five-part music is the lute, flute, and so on.

original: mkhas pa ni glu mkhan sna tshogs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni glu mkhan sna tshogs so //
translated: The skilled are the various singers.

original: rtse ba ni rna bas so //
analyzed: rtse ba ni rna bas so //
translated: Play is with the ears.

original: dga' ba ni sems kyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba ni sems kyis so //
translated: Joy is with the mind.

original: rab tu rgyu pa ni lus dang ngag gi kun du g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu rgyu pa ni lus dang ngag gi kun du g-yo ba'o //
translated: The movement is the movement of body and speech.

original: 'obs ni 'obs so //
analyzed: 'obs ni 'obs so //
translated: The moat is a moat.

original: chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa zhes bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chu'i rgyun dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa zhes bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chu'i rgyun dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The water flowing in accordance with the wind and so on is a stream of water that accords with the wind and so on.

original: padma ni padma dmar po'o //
analyzed: padma ni padma dmar po'o //
translated: The lotus is a red lotus.

original: pu nda r'i ka ni padma dkar po'o //
analyzed: pu nda r'i ka ni padma dkar po'o //
translated: The pundarīka is a white lotus.

original: rigs che zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa bas gya nom pa'o //
analyzed: rigs che zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa bas gya nom pa'o //
translated: The great of the great is more sublime than the sublime.

original: dri zhim po'i sgra ni dri zhim po'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: dri zhim po'i sgra ni dri zhim po'i rnam grangs so //
translated: The word fragrant is a synonym for sweet-smelling.

original: rdzing bu de dag ces bya ba ni skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'o //🔽khor @223a * //
analyzed: rdzing bu de dag ces bya ba ni skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'o // khor @223a * //
translated: Those pools are pools in the pleasure groves.

original: yug gi tshad ces bya ba ni chos thams cad du'o //
analyzed: yug gi tshad ces bya ba ni chos thams cad du'o //
translated: The word circumference is used for all things.

original: rgyang grags rgyang grags zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyang grags rgyang grags zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'o //
translated: The word league is a repetition.

original: mthing ga la sogs pa'i tshig ni snga ma bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mthing ga la sogs pa'i tshig ni snga ma bshad pa'o //
translated: The words blue and so on are explained as before.

original: sgra 'byin pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra 'byin pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: The word sound is a sound that is heard.

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
translated: The method of the Buddha is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gus par byed pa ni mchog tu dang ba ste /
analyzed: de la gus par byed pa ni mchog tu dang ba ste /
translated: The word devotion is supreme clarity.

original: des rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: des rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: The word consisting of is a following.

original: gang dag la bde bar gshegs pa dag las thos pa bsams pa dag la ste /
analyzed: gang dag la bde bar gshegs pa dag las thos pa bsams pa dag la ste /
translated: The word heard is from the Sugatas.

original: de ltar de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de rnams kyi'o //
translated: The word thus is of those.

original: grong khyer gyi dbus na bzhi mdo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: grong khyer gyi dbus na bzhi mdo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word center is in the middle of the city.

original: khor yug ces bya ba ni ngos so sor ro //
analyzed: khor yug ces bya ba ni ngos so sor ro //
translated: The “circumference” is the individual sides.

original: khang ba'i longs spyod ni bskor ba'o //
analyzed: khang ba'i longs spyod ni bskor ba'o //
translated: The “enjoyment” of the palace is the surrounding.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa'o //
translated: It is because of the enjoyment of the fruits and the complete enjoyment.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa ni 'bras bu dang / me tog la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa ni 'bras bu dang / me tog la sogs pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the fruits is the flowers, fruits, and so on.

original: yongs su longs spyod pa ni ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su longs spyod pa ni ma lus pa ste /
translated: The complete enjoyment is the complete enjoyment of the fruits.

original: 'chag sar 'chag pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chag sar 'chag pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the complete enjoyment is the enjoyment of the fruits, such as walking in the pleasure groves and so on.

original: bar zhes bya ba ni mtshams te /
analyzed: bar zhes bya ba ni mtshams te /
translated: The “interval” is the boundary.

original: phyi nang gi skabs so //
analyzed: phyi nang gi skabs so //
translated: It is the space between the inner and outer.

original: ldan pa ni 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni 'byor pa'o //
translated: “Endowed” means “possessing.”

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dbang po thams cad rjes su 'dzin pas na dbang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dbang po thams cad rjes su 'dzin pas na dbang ngo //
translated: Since all the faculties are sustained by the five sense objects, they are the “sense objects.”

original: de dang ldan pa ni dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ni dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: Possessing them is “having the sense objects.”

original: rtse ba ni dag gis so //
analyzed: rtse ba ni dag gis so //
translated: “Playing” is with the body.

original: dga' ba ni yid kyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba ni yid kyis so //
translated: “Rejoicing” is with the mind.

original: kun du spyod pa ni lus kyis so //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa ni lus kyis so //
translated: “Conducting oneself” is with the body.

original: dus re zhig ces bya ba ni dus thung ba'o //
analyzed: dus re zhig ces bya ba ni dus thung ba'o //
translated: “For a short time” is for a short period.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rtse ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rtse ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi 'og tu'o //
translated: “Then” is after the time of playing and so on.

original: dus gsum zhes bya ba ni snga dro dang / nyi ma phyed dang / phyi dro dag tu'o //
analyzed: dus gsum zhes bya ba ni snga dro dang / nyi ma phyed dang / phyi dro dag tu'o //
translated: The three times are morning, noon, and evening.

original: khri'i khyad par ni gser gyi rkang pa dang zhes bya ba nas 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bsham par bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: khri'i khyad par ni gser gyi rkang pa dang zhes bya ba nas 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bsham par bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: The special features of the throne are described from “with golden legs” up to “half a krośa high.”

original: shing bal bting ba'am /
analyzed: shing bal bting ba'am /
translated: A cloth is spread on it.

original: go ni ka'i stan nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: go ni ka'i stan nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: The seat is made of cotton.

original: go ni ka ni rgya'i gos kyi stan no //
analyzed: go ni ka ni rgya'i gos kyi stan no //
translated: The cotton is a seat made of Chinese cloth.

original: 'di la steng na yod pas ni steng snying po can du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la steng na yod pas ni steng snying po can du byas pa'o //
translated: It is made of cotton because it is on top of it.

original: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba ni ka shi ka'i gos sam lha'i gos so //
analyzed: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba ni ka shi ka'i gos sam lha'i gos so //
translated: The cloth is spread with Kāśīka cloth or divine cloth.

original: 'di la de lta bu yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la de lta bu yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it has that.

original: mnyam pa ni ji lta ba bzhin yin te /
analyzed: mnyam pa ni ji lta ba bzhin yin te /
translated: Even is as it is.🔽It is even because it is held that way.

original: de ltar 'dzin par byed pas na ka ba tshad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dzin par byed pas na ka ba tshad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The pillar is the right size.

original: lhan cig pa ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig pa ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: Together means completely.

original: nyams dga' ba ni rtse gcig tu'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni rtse gcig tu'o //
translated: Delightful means one-pointed.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: ji 'di legs @223b par gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji 'di legs @223b par gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is well-established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: legs par yang dag par smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: legs par yang dag par smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He says, Well-spoken, etc.

original: mu tig gi phreng bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' ma dag tu dra ba dang / dra phyed 'phyang ba dang / dbus su mu tig 'brum bu'i rigs gang la yod pa'o //
analyzed: mu tig gi phreng bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' ma dag tu dra ba dang / dra phyed 'phyang ba dang / dbus su mu tig 'brum bu'i rigs gang la yod pa'o //
translated: Adorned with a pearl necklace means that it has a garland and half-garland hanging from the ends, and a string of pearls in the middle.

original: mngon par gtor ba ni mdun nas so //
analyzed: mngon par gtor ba ni mdun nas so //
translated: Scattered means in front.

original: rab tu gtor ba ni logs gsum nas so //
analyzed: rab tu gtor ba ni logs gsum nas so //
translated: Well-scattered means on the three sides.

original: yang dag par gtor ba ni yang sgo bzhi'i ngos nas so //
analyzed: yang dag par gtor ba ni yang sgo bzhi'i ngos nas so //
translated: Properly scattered means again on the four sides of the gate.

original: chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ni chos la gang de dag dad pa dang 'dun pa dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ni chos la gang de dag dad pa dang 'dun pa dag pa'o //
translated: With pure Dharma intention means with pure faith and aspiration for the Dharma.

original: chos la gus pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽bsten pa ni yang dag par bsten pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos la gus pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // bsten pa ni yang dag par bsten pa nyid do //
translated: Respect for the Dharma means being a spiritual friend.🔽Relying means proper reliance.

original: dad par 'os pa la dad pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dad par 'os pa la dad pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Worthy of faith means having faith.

original: log par ltung ba ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: log par ltung ba ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba'o //
translated: Falling away is going to a bad destiny.

original: gnas pa ni rgyun chad par ro //
analyzed: gnas pa ni rgyun chad par ro //
translated: Abiding is the continuity.

original: dga' ba ni mgu pas so //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mgu pas so //
translated: Delight is by way of satisfaction.

original: mgu pa zhes bya ba ni mgu ba des ro stod mtho bar gyur par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgu pa zhes bya ba ni mgu ba des ro stod mtho bar gyur par byed pa'o //
translated: Satisfaction is what makes the upper part of the body swell with joy.

original: de nyid la gcig tu sems pa'i phyir yi rangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la gcig tu sems pa'i phyir yi rangs pa'o //
translated: It is rejoicing because of that satisfaction.

original: dga' ba khyad par du gyur ba ni rab tu mgu ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba khyad par du gyur ba ni rab tu mgu ba'o //
translated: Extreme satisfaction is rapture.

original: dga' ba dang ldan pa'i dang ba ni dga' ba dang yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ldan pa'i dang ba ni dga' ba dang yid bde ba'o //
translated: Faith associated with delight is faith and mental satisfaction.

original: skyes pa 'di la yod pa de skad ces bya ba ste thos so zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: skyes pa 'di la yod pa de skad ces bya ba ste thos so zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: One who has this is called one who has delight.

original: chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bdag chos 'phags chos ston par snang ba dang / nye bar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bdag chos 'phags chos ston par snang ba dang / nye bar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du /
translated: The perception of the non-abiding of all dharmas is as follows: Just as the Dharma-born Ārya does not perceive the teaching of the Dharma and does not apprehend it,

original: chos thams cad kyi rgyu nges par mi gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'du shes shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rgyu nges par mi gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'du shes shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: in the same way, the non-abiding of the causes of all dharmas is the extremely well-equipoised perception here.

original: 'du shes 'di'i mthu zhig 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes 'di'i mthu zhig 'byung zhe na /
translated: What power arises from this perception?

original: de ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That is called “samādhi,” and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin nyid sgo ste thabs chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid sgo ste thabs chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Samādhi itself is the door, because it is the great method.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid thams cad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid thams cad do //
translated: The nature of all phenomena is all characteristics.

original: de dag la lta ba ni rnam par lta ba'o //
analyzed: de dag la lta ba ni rnam par lta ba'o //
translated: The view of those is the view of all characteristics.

original: de mi dmigs pa ni med par nges pa'o //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa ni med par nges pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of those is the ascertainment of non-existence.

original: de dag gi shes pa la nges par 'byung ba ni gtan du med par nges pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi shes pa la nges par 'byung ba ni gtan du med par nges pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the knowledge of those is the ascertainment of the complete non-existence.

original: chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te /
translated: The non-difference of all phenomena is sameness, because they do not exist by their own characteristics.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //🔽mnyam pa @224a * //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o // mnyam pa @224a * //
translated: The samādhi that observes that is called that.

original: nyid de yang de bzhin nyid do //🔽des chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: nyid de yang de bzhin nyid do // des chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba yin te /
translated: That sameness is also suchness.🔽By that, one sees all phenomena as non-arising.

original: de bas na thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba'o //
translated: Therefore, one sees everything as unchanging.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar su rig bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar su rig bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand the concentration called “seeing all the Tathagatas.”

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la rim gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la rim gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: “Dwelling in these concentrations” means dwelling in the concentrations in order.

original: 'di la phyogs bcu yod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
analyzed: 'di la phyogs bcu yod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
translated: The world of the ten directions is the world of the ten directions because there are ten directions.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ces bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ces bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning of “all world systems” is the same.

original: deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa dag mthong ba'o //
analyzed: deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa dag mthong ba'o //
translated: Now, one sees innumerable, unlimited Buddhas.

original: gal te dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa du ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa du ma yin te /
translated: If one says that there are not many Tathagatas at one time,

original: gcig kho na sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par spyod pa yin no zhe na /🔽rtag tu sangs rgyas gcig kho nas sku tshe mtha' yas par byin gyis rlob pa yod na /
analyzed: gcig kho na sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par spyod pa yin no zhe na / rtag tu sangs rgyas gcig kho nas sku tshe mtha' yas par byin gyis rlob pa yod na /
translated: but only one who acts for the benefit of all beings,

original: ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
translated: why not accept that there is always only one Buddha, who prolongs his life span through his creative power?

original: gal te rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one says that another Buddha appears through the power of the cause,

original: de lta na ni rgyu'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dag cig car 'byung ba la 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: de lta na ni rgyu'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dag cig car 'byung ba la 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: If that is so, then what is the contradiction in infinite Tathagatas appearing simultaneously in infinite world-realms by the power of their causes?

original: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis gling bzhi pa gcig tu cig car mi skye ste /
analyzed: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis gling bzhi pa gcig tu cig car mi skye ste /
translated: For example, two Chakravartins do not appear simultaneously in one world of the four continents,

original: the tshom med par gcig gi las byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom med par gcig gi las byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one of them necessarily performs the actions of the other.

original: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 'byung bar shing rta chen po rnams kyis brtags nas gzhag go //
analyzed: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 'byung bar shing rta chen po rnams kyis brtags nas gzhag go //
translated: In the same way, the great charioteers have determined that one Tathagata appears in one trichiliocosm.

original: rtogs par khong du chud ces bya ba ni rtogs pa ni thogs pa med par de khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs par khong du chud ces bya ba ni rtogs pa ni thogs pa med par de khong du chud pa'o //
translated: The phrase he has realized means that he has realized it without obstruction.

original: bslabs so zhes bya ba ni bslab par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bslabs so zhes bya ba ni bslab par byas pa'o //
translated: The phrase he has trained means that he has trained.🔽 The phrase he has been instructed means that he has been instructed.🔽 The phrase he has been told means that he has been told.🔽 The phrase he has been given means that he has been given.🔽 The phrase he has been made to take up means that he has been made to take it up.

original: ji skad bsgo zhes bya ba ni des sngar khyod la gang byas pa bzhin du zung shig ces bya ba ni sems la brjed pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad bsgo zhes bya ba ni des sngar khyod la gang byas pa bzhin du zung shig ces bya ba ni sems la brjed pa med par bya'o //
translated: The phrase he has been made to remember means that he has been made to remember it without forgetting.

original: mgo'i gos ni gos so //
analyzed: mgo'i gos ni gos so //
translated: The phrase he has been made to wear it on his head means that he has been made to wear it on his head.🔽 The phrase he has been made to wear it on his body means that he has been made to wear it on his body.

original: de'i thod ni mgo'i gos kyi thod do //
analyzed: de'i thod ni mgo'i gos kyi thod do //
translated: The top of the head is the top of the head-covering.

original: rab tu gdung ba ni mya ngan no //
analyzed: rab tu gdung ba ni mya ngan no //
translated: Agitation is grief.

original: mi dga' bar 'gyur ba ni sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi dga' bar 'gyur ba ni sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Displeasure is the state of suffering.

original: mthar phyin pa'i dga' ba ni rangs pa'o //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa'i dga' ba ni rangs pa'o //
translated: The highest joy is delight.

original: yon tan dang ldan pas sems rnyog pa med pa ni dang ba'o //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pas sems rnyog pa med pa ni dang ba'o //
translated: The mind is clear because it possesses good qualities.

original: de'i yon tan la ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni ri mo byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan la ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni ri mo byed pa'o //
translated: One is amazed at its good qualities.

original: gus pa ni mchod pa'o //
analyzed: gus pa ni mchod pa'o //
translated: Respect is worship.

original: sgra ji lta bus she na //🔽mi su @224b 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: sgra ji lta bus she na // mi su @224b 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: By what kind of sound?🔽By the sound of “Oh, how wonderful!”

original: bar chad bya'o snyam mo zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bar chad bya'o snyam mo zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “I will create an obstacle” means “for that reason.”

original: de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so zhes bya ba ni g-yeng bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so zhes bya ba ni g-yeng bar byas pa'o //
translated: “It is thus obscured” means “it is distracted.”

original: ji ltar na ci nas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar na ci nas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “In such a way” means “in whatever way.”

original: sems bde zhes bya ba ni dga' ba de nyid kyis sems las su rung ba'o //
analyzed: sems bde zhes bya ba ni dga' ba de nyid kyis sems las su rung ba'o //
translated: The mind is happy because it is pliable due to that very joy.

original: de las nyis 'gyur du gyur pa'i dga' ba yin pa'i phyir sems bar tu dga' ba'o //🔽yon tan gyis rnam pa mi rnams kyi yon tan gyi spyi'o //
analyzed: de las nyis 'gyur du gyur pa'i dga' ba yin pa'i phyir sems bar tu dga' ba'o // yon tan gyis rnam pa mi rnams kyi yon tan gyi spyi'o //
translated: It is mental joy because it is twice as much joy as that.🔽The general quality of humans is their virtue.

original: yon tan gyi khyad par ni mi'i las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi khyad par ni mi'i las 'das pa'o //
translated: The specific quality is that they surpass humans.

original: bzod do zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed par yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzod do zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed par yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “I can bear it” means that he wishes to do it himself.

original: yul zhes bya ba ni bus pa'o //
analyzed: yul zhes bya ba ni bus pa'o //
translated: “The object” is the child.

original: bsam pa rig par byas nas brtson pa chung bar gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
analyzed: bsam pa rig par byas nas brtson pa chung bar gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
translated: Having understood his intention, he said, “Make your effort small,” and so on.

original: brtson pa chung ba ni brtson 'grus chung ba'o //
analyzed: brtson pa chung ba ni brtson 'grus chung ba'o //
translated: “Small effort” means small exertion.

original: gang skad cig de nyid dang thang cig de nyid dang / yul tsam nyid la yang zhes bya ba ni nyan pa rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag gis gsum smos pa yin no //
analyzed: gang skad cig de nyid dang thang cig de nyid dang / yul tsam nyid la yang zhes bya ba ni nyan pa rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag gis gsum smos pa yin no //
translated: “In that very moment, in that very instant, in that very place” refers to the three statements due to the different faiths of the listeners.

original: spobs pa med par gyur te zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa med par gyur te zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: “He became speechless” means he was unable to teach.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita, etc. is the explanation.

original: lan glan pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gyi bdun pa'o //
analyzed: lan glan pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gyi bdun pa'o //
translated: The answer is the seventh reason.

original: spobs pa ma skyes pa ni spobs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa ma skyes pa ni spobs pa med pa'o //
translated: Lack of eloquence is the absence of eloquence.

original: mang po ni rnam pa mang po'o //
analyzed: mang po ni rnam pa mang po'o //
translated: Many means of many kinds.

original: rgya che ba ni rnam pa mang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgya che ba ni rnam pa mang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Vast means infinite in many ways.

original: longs spyod ni nor ro //
analyzed: longs spyod ni nor ro //
translated: Wealth is riches.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: Superior to all worlds is supramundane.

original: spyi bo'i steng ni dbu'i steng ngo //
analyzed: spyi bo'i steng ni dbu'i steng ngo //
